vista.gui
Class WorkerActionListener

java.lang.Object
  vista.gui.WorkerActionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public abstract class WorkerActionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

A class that uses SwingWorker to do the work in a thread so as to allow updates to the components

Version:
